name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: You need to use TMs to teach good moves to POKEMON!

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: You have some HMs right? POKEMON can't ever forget those moves.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: My bird POKEMON should be ready for battle.

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: They need to learn better moves.

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: TMs are on sale in CELADON! But, only a few people have HMs!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: Teach POKEMON moves of the same element type for more power.

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Have you taught your bird POKEMON how to FLY?

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: Bird POKEMON are my true love!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: We ride out here because there's more room!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue:
It's cool you made your POKEMON so strong! Might is right! 
And you know it!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Have you heard of the legendary POKEMON?

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: The 3 legendary POKEMON are all birds of prey.

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: I'm not into it, but OK! Let's go!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: Winning, losing, it doesn't matter in the long run!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: C'mon, c'mon. Let's go, let's go, let's go!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: What, what, what? What do you want?

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: POKEMON fight? Cool! Rumble!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: You know who'd win, you and me one on one!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: Perfect! I need to burn some time!

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: Raising POKEMON is a drag, man.
